text:
If I chose "information-communication" for my studies it's because i think this cursus can have a large assignement and job for my future.
At the beginning of my last year in high school I had no idea of what i wanted to do after but i had at the same time a largest choice of cursus. So I was thinking between history class, history of art or cinema but i chose information and communication.
I think it's a great choice for me because this cursus can help me to work in publicity after, with all the skills that I'm going to have.
The situation that help me to chose this cursus it's the fact that  majority of people worked withe social media had or studying in communication and social media it's something I like for my entertainment or for working. It's a great place where my generation spend a lot of their time and with the new technologies that arrives it's great things to study in communication on social media and learn this aspect and all of the aspect of information and communication.
The second situation that encourage me to chose this studies is the different journalist in the world because for me they have a sort of self confidence and the power to talk very well without any difficulties and their sure of what they tells in their speech.
And when I maked some research about jobs in communication and how this worked, I founded the fact of the relation between people you had in this job and like this idea to communicate with others.
 this webpage performs keylogging of input typed into a textbox. In other words, when focused on the textbox below, the page will record each time you hit a key or select text with your mouse. All of the data is stored locally on your machine in the DOM and is downloadable as a JSON file. More information about the motivation of this project and the format of the produced data are available here.
